snippet: The announcement that Lourdes Lopez, a former New York City Ballet principal dancer, will be the new artistic director of the Miami City Ballet is the latest development at the company.
abstract: Lourdes Lopez, a former principal dancer for the New York City Ballet and a devotee of the Balanchine style, is named artistic director at Miami City Ballet.
lead_paragraph: The announcement that Lourdes Lopez, a former New York City Ballet principal dancer, will be the new artistic director of the Miami City Ballet is the latest development at the company.

headline.seo: Lourdes Lopez to Succeed Edward Villella in Dance Company
headline.main: Balanchine Disciple Chosen to Lead Miami City Ballet
headline.print_headline: Balanchine Disciple Chosen To Lead Miami City Ballet
